subject: SF Express SF6047079989225
description_text:
Hi, 

I was wondering if you were able to give me an update on this order please? It’s shown as in the uk since the 29/11/25 but there hasn’t been any movement since. 
I was unsure if it had perhaps changed to a different courier now it’s within the UK? 

Thanks, 
David

conversations.body_text: Hi David Pirrie,    Yes, they will deliver the parcel via Royal Mail.  https://www.royalmail.com/track-your-item#/tracking-results/IW270521803GB

Thank you very much that’s great! 
Thanks, 
David 

>
